title: Once sanction is granted under this regulation, the owner / developer shall have to complete the development and hand over the developed reservation to the Authority within the period as specified by Authority
clause_text: Once sanction is granted under this regulation, the owner / developer shall have to complete the development and hand over the developed reservation to the Authority within the period as specified by Authority. Thereafter Authority may levy penalty for any delay.
section: General conditions / notes to allow development under above regulations :-

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
